select sa_no, p_name, c_id, pa_payway, sa_money, sa_date from sale inner join pay on sale.pa_no = pay.pa_no inner join orders on pay.o_no = orders.o_no inner join basket on orders.b_no = basket.b_no inner join product on basket.p_code = product.p_code inner join customer on customer.c_num = basket.c_num
p_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword} || '%'
pa_payway LIKE '%'||#{keyword} || '%'
to_char(sa_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{start_date} and #{end_date}
order by sa_date desc

select sum(sa_money) from sale inner join pay on sale.pa_no = pay.pa_no inner join orders on pay.o_no = orders.o_no inner join basket on orders.b_no = basket.b_no inner join customer on basket.c_num = customer.c_num group by c_id having c_id=#{c_id}
